products.name: Chemical Guys: Mr Pink Foaming Car Wash Soap
products.description: Perfect wash for weekly maintenace. Excellent for two-bucket wash or foam gun. PH neutral for a gentle wash

products.name: Meguiar's Ultimate Wash & Wax
products.description: Car Exterior Wash. Clear Coat Safe. Deep Shine. Incredible sudsing action safely lifts dirt and grime to minimize swirling

products.name: Grip Premium XL Plush Drying Towel
products.description: 6ft. x 6ft XL Plush Towel. For cleaning, drying and polishing. Plush weave microfiber is highly absorbent, lint-free and scratch-free.

products.name: 2-in-1 Microfiber Car Wash Mop Mitt
products.description: Microfiber Car Wash Mop Mitt with 45in aluminum alloy long handle, Chenille car cleaning kit, brush and duster. Also comes with mop head, 1 towel, and air vent duster. You can remove the handle and use the mop head as a mitt.

products.name: Jay Leno's Garage Tire Shine
products.description: Jya Leno's high gloss, no sling tire shine, comes in a 16 oz bottle. Water-based technology guards against browning, aging, and fading. UV inhibitors guard against harmful effects from the sun. Achieve a deep black, brand new shine. Spreads evenly with any foam applicator.
